data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Another problem with the IRS whistleblower program, particularly in its relation to professionalism, is the right of whistleblowers to appeal their cases to the Tax Court. With ____ lack ____ communication ____ explanation ____ the IRS, ____ may ____ their ____ to ____ Tax Court under ____ belief ____ they ____ not ____ the ____ award ____. However, they have no substantial information to back up this claim.
data.partBlankContent: Another problem with the IRS whistleblower program, particularly in its relation to professionalism, is the right of whistleblowers to appeal their cases to the Tax Court. With t__ lack o_ communication a__ explanation b_ the IRS, whistle_______ may app___ their rew___ to t__ Tax Court under t__ belief th__ they ha__ not rece____ the pro___ award amo___. data.fullContent: Another problem with the IRS whistleblower program, particularly in its relation to professionalism, is the right of whistleblowers to appeal their cases to the Tax Court. With the lack of communication and explanation by the IRS, whistleblowers may appeal their reward to the Tax Court under the belief that they have not received the proper award amount. However, they have no substantial information to back up this claim.
data.answer: 国税局举报人计划的另一个问题是举报人向税务法院上诉的权利，尤其是在它与职业精神的关系上。由于国税局缺乏沟通和解释，举报人可能会以没有得到适当的赔偿金为由，向税务法院提起上诉。然而，他们没有足够的信息来支持这一说法。
